_header: Fair maiden who is this bairn
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 395.
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; dialogues, Virgin and Christ
_description: A carol of the Nativity — four quatrains (aabb) and four-line burden (aaaa): ‘Mater ora filium / Vt post hoc exilium / Nobis donet gaudium / Beatorum omnium’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Fayre maydyn who is this barnThat þu beriste in thyn
                    arme…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
Þat he will send vs of his graceIn hevyn onhigh to haue a
                    placeExplicit
OxfBal354.Attributed Title:
Mater ora filium vt post hoc exilium / nobis donet gaudium beatorum
                        omnium (p. 374)
